message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth over $100 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $85 today. I believe this is a great opportunity for you not to miss.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to pay that price today.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. After considering your offer, I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I am willing to sell the product to you for $80 today.
